issue.title: Multiple DRCSim issues, including p3d and Camera plugin missing includes 2.5, and 2.6.1

content.raw:
Real Time Factor started out at 0.04, and after 6 seconds real time factor changed to 0.03. What was meant by barely runs means its slow, and it frequently pops up a message dialog that says not responding. Additionally, the instructions on http://www.ros.org/wiki/stereo_image_proc?distro=fuerte for stereo_image_procs returns an empty image screen (i.e. - no images load, and the canvas stays gray.).

Graphics Processor is:  Intel GMA 4500MHD Dynamic Video Memory Technology 5.0
I'll see if I can find Linux drivers for this GPU.

Thanks,


Aaron
content.html:
Real Time Factor started out at 0.04, and after 6 seconds real time factor changed to 0.03. What was meant by barely runs means its slow, and it frequently pops up a message dialog that says not responding. Additionally, the instructions on http://www.ros.org/wiki/stereo_image_proc?distro=fuerte for stereo_image_procs returns an empty image screen (i.e. - no images load, and the canvas stays gray.).

Graphics Processor is: Intel GMA 4500MHD Dynamic Video Memory Technology 5.0 I'll see if I can find Linux drivers for this GPU.

Thanks,

Aaron
